dialogue.text: Hey there! Welcome to my little area in the Options menu.
Here, you'll find options that either haven't been put into one of the main categories, or just don't fit into any of them.
If you need to know what an option does, let me know by pressing H. I'll be more than happy to explain!
With all that being said, I'll leave you to it. The menu really just works like other category menus.
Oh, and uh... I'm gonna have to return you to the main options menu now. Sorry!
